name: Mugunghwa
description:
Love is eternal. Love makes life go on. I will follow you to the end of time my dear, if it means we can stay together~♡

꘎♡━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━♡꘎

Mugunghwa is a game loosely set in South Korea about a lover who has been watching you from the shadows. They leave you gifts in hope that you'll one day seek them out so you can be together forever...

To complete the demo all you must do is find the 5 Mugunhwa flowers hidden around the stage.

In the full game I would like to add psychological horror elements but given the time frame I had for the demo it just wasn't possible. I hope to update the game in the future however so if you like what you see, keep your eyes peeled for more!

꘎♡━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━♡꘎

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Left Shift - Sprint

Right Click - Zoom
